channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: PepsiCo trims revenue outlook as North American snacking, key international markets lag
item.description: PepsiCo lowered its full-year outlook for organic revenue but reiterated its forecast for its earnings growth.

item.title: Pfizer CEO's Job Is at Risk. A Shot of Discipline Could Help.
item.description: As activist Starboard teams up with former Pfizer executives, the pharma giant’s lack of focus is in the spotlight.

item.title: A Less Glamorous Group of Stocks Steps Into the Spotlight
item.description: Earnings from the utilities, materials and industrials sectors could offer more signs of a broadening market rally.

item.title: No need to sell this AI data center play ahead of earnings — and updates on 3 more industrial stocks
item.description: Deutsche Bank listed Dover as a short-term sell idea, cautioning investors of underwhelming quarterly results later that may pressure shares later thi...

item.title: Levi Strauss trims guidance as it weighs sale of Dockers business
item.description: Denim maker Levi Strauss is looking to sell its Dockers brand as the khaki maker drags down the company's overall performance.

item.title: Modelo brewer Constellation falls despite an earnings beat. Here's why we're not concerned
item.description: Constellation Brands on Thursday delivered a solid earnings report and set the stage for an anchor to be raised in the next two quarters.

item.title: S&P Gains While Tumult Grips Chinese Stocks
item.description: U.S. stocks mostly ticked higher while Hong Kong’s Hang Seng Index, which had surged recently while the mainland was on holiday, suffered its worst pu...

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Futures Slip as Storm Approaches
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures were holding near support around $2.70 with the market attentive as Hurricane Milton moves toward Florida.

item.title: Honeywell Plans to Spin Off Advanced Materials Business
item.description: The move is part of the chief executive’s plan to simplify the business around three core trends.

item.title: Samsung posts disappointing third-quarter profit guidance as it grapples with AI chips
item.description: Samsung posts worse-than-expected guidance for third quarter
